articles.author: Aliza Chasan
articles.title: NAACP issues travel advisory for Florida, says state "has become hostile to Black Americans" - CBS News
articles.description: The NAACP on Saturday issued a travel advisory for Florida, joining two other civil rights groups in warning potential tourists about the state's hostility "toward African Americans, people of color and LGBTQ+ individuals."
articles.content: The NAACP issued a formal travel advisory for Florida on Saturday in response to what the organization described as Gov. Ron DeSantis' "aggressive attempts to erase Black history and to restrict dive… [+2996 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX launches private citizens for 8-day visit to space station - The Washington Post
articles.description: It's the second mission chartered by the Houston company Axiom Space. Aboard will be a veteran NASA astronaut, two Saudis and an American entrepreneur.

articles.author: Dinah Voyles Pulver
articles.title: US endangered birds include whooping crane, condor, scrub-jays: List - USA TODAY
articles.description: Condors, cranes and some scrub-jay species are among more than 100 of America's most at-risk birds for extinction.
articles.content:
If you enjoy watching cardinals or bluebirds at a feeder or seeing a great blue heron at the water's edge, it may not be immediately apparent but the nation's birds are under siege.
